## createAutoEnvironmentAdapter() function

Create an EnvironmentAdapter that auto-detects from the current environment. This is useful for Node.js environments where you want automatic detection without needing to create a full platform adapter.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function createAutoEnvironmentAdapter(): EnvironmentAdapter;
```
**Returns:**

[EnvironmentAdapter](./core.environmentadapter.md)

An EnvironmentAdapter with auto-detected color support
